# Server Rules
This server is currently under HEAVY development and is not [bold]technically[/bold] public. If you are here, you should probably know [italic]why[/italic] you are here. That being said, here is the [bold]golden rule[/bold] during this time:
## Don't be a cunt.
[italic]Rules are and will be subject to change as development progresses, for now, treat this like a LRP-style server, with a bit more freedom at the moment.[/italic]
